title.zh: InternVL3.5 – 上海AI Lab开源的多模态大模型
title.en: InternVL3.5 - Shanghai AI Lab's Open Source Multimodal Large Model

summary.zh: InternVL3.5（书生·万象3.5）是上海人工智能实验室开源的多模态大模型，在通用能力、推理能力和部署效率上全面升级。
summary.en: InternVL3.5 is an open-source multimodal large model from Shanghai AI Lab, with comprehensive upgrades in general capabilities, reasoning abilities, and deployment efficiency.

content.zh:
InternVL3.5 – 上海AI Lab开源的多模态大模型

InternVL3.5是什么
InternVL3.5（书生·万象3.5）是上海人工智能实验室开源的多模态大模型，模型在通用能力、推理能力和部署效率上全面升级，提供从10亿到2410亿参数的九种尺寸版本，覆盖不同资源需求场景，包含稠密模型和专家混合模型（MoE），是首个支持GPT-OSS语言模型基座的开源多模态大模型。InternVL3.5 采用级联式强化学习（Cascade RL）框架，通过"离线预热-在线精调"两阶段流程，显著提升推理能力。旗舰模型 InternVL3.5-241B-A28B 在多学科推理基准 MMMU 中获得开源模型最高分77.7分，超越 GPT-5。借助动态视觉分辨率路由（ViR）和解耦部署框架（DvD），模型在高分辨率输入下的响应速度大幅提升，38B 模型的吞吐量提升达4.05倍。
content.en:
InternVL3.5 – Shanghai AI Lab's Open Source Multimodal Large Model

What is InternVL3.5
InternVL3.5 is an open-source multimodal large model from Shanghai AI Lab, with comprehensive upgrades in general capabilities, reasoning abilities, and deployment efficiency. It provides nine size versions from 1 billion to 241 billion parameters, covering different resource requirement scenarios, including dense models and mixture-of-experts (MoE) models. It is the first open-source multimodal large model supporting the GPT-OSS language model base. InternVL3.5 adopts a cascaded reinforcement learning (Cascade RL) framework, significantly improving reasoning capabilities through a two-stage process of "offline warm-up and online fine-tuning". The flagship model InternVL3.5-241B-A28B achieved the highest score of 77.7 points among open-source models on the multi-disciplinary reasoning benchmark MMMU, surpassing GPT-5. With dynamic visual resolution routing (ViR) and decoupled deployment framework (DvD), the model's response speed under high-resolution input is greatly improved, with a throughput increase of up to 4.05 times for the 38B model.

metaDescription.zh: InternVL3.5是上海AI Lab开源的多模态大模型，在MMMU基准测试中获得开源模型最高分77.7分，支持从10亿到2410亿参数的多种版本。
metaDescription.en: InternVL3.5 is an open-source multimodal large model from Shanghai AI Lab, achieving the highest score of 77.7 points among open-source models on MMMU benchmark, supporting multiple versions from 1B to 241B parameters.
